questionTitle: I'm free this evening. ________ we go out to dinner?
Someone threw the drowning man a lifebelt in the ________ of time.
Children have to stay ________ school until they are 15.
The management received a lot of ________ about the poor service in their hotel.
It has been raining steadily and continuously for three days ________ now.
The opening ________ of the play took place in an army camp.
I don't know what to do this weekend. Perhaps I ________ at home and do some work.
When you ________ him, give him my best wishes.
The sign in the cinema asks people ________ smoke.
Despite her undoubted ability at tennis, she never became the ________ of the local tennis club.
We went to see play last night and, ________ for Tony, we all enjoyed it very much.
I hate being unemployed. I'd feel much happier if I were in ________.
Four meters of this material ________ at $24.50.
It was difficult to ________ a date which was convenient for everyone.
There was nothing they could do ________ leave the car at the roadside where it had broken down.
Did anything emerge ________ your discussion?
He might be good at his job, but you can't rely ________ him.
The concert began ________ a piece by an unknown composer.
When he realized it was four o'clock, he stopped ________ a rest and went on working.
Have you got time to discuss your work now or are you ________ to leave?
